translations.text: By the sun and its brightness,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Washshamsi waduhaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the moon as it follows it,<sup foot_note=77623>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Walqamari itha talaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the day as it unveils it,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wannahari itha jallaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the night as it conceals it!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wallayli itha yaghshaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And by heaven and ˹the One˺ Who built it,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wassama-i wama banaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and the earth and ˹the One˺ Who spread it!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wal-ardi wama tahaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: And by the soul and ˹the One˺ Who fashioned it,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wanafsin wama sawwaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: then with ˹the knowledge of˺ right and wrong inspired it!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faalhamaha fujooraha wataqwaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Successful indeed is the one who purifies their soul,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Qad aflaha man zakkaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: and doomed is the one who corrupts it!
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Waqad khaba man dassaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: Thamûd rejected ˹the truth˺ out of arrogance,
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Kaththabat thamoodu bitaghwaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: when the most wicked of them was roused ˹to kill the she-camel˺.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Ithi inbaAAatha ashqaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَـٰهَا

translations.text: But the messenger of Allah warned them, “˹Do not disturb˺ Allah’s camel and her ˹turn to˺ drink!”
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Faqala lahum rasoolu Allahi naqataAllahi wasuqyaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

verses.text_uthmani: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنۢبِهِمْ فَسَوَّىٰهَا

translations.text: Still they defied him and slaughtered her. So their Lord crushed them for their crime, levelling all to the ground.<sup foot_note=77624>1</sup>
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Fakaththaboohu faAAaqaroohafadamdama AAalayhim rabbuhum bithanbihim fasawwaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration

translations.text: He has no fear of consequences.
translations.resource_name: Dr. Mustafa Khattab, the Clear Quran

translations.text: Wala yakhafu AAuqbaha
translations.resource_name: Transliteration
